" We can't let the Preds find this or get anywhere near it.  I =
vote we get a shield grid in here ta keep them out, and establish some patr=
ol duty in this area."

He stands guard as he gets onto a higher perch near=
 the door.

" Nightshift ta Lord Elder, we found something.  Looks like som=
e sorta power source."

<html><head></head><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift gets up and fa=
ces Perceptor and Windlord.  He knew what needed to be done.</div><div=
><br></div><div>" We can't let the Preds find this or get anywhere near it.=
  I vote we get a shield grid in here ta keep them out, and establish =
some patrol duty in this area."</div><div><br></div><div>He stands guard as=
 he gets onto a higher perch near the door.</div><div><br></div><div>" Nigh=
tshift ta Lord Elder, we found something.  Looks like some sorta power=
 source."<br><br>Local artist who specializes in illustration, using tradit=
ional and digital media.  <div><br></div><div>I also specialize in han=
d made crafts.  Great for any occasion!  </div><div><br></div><di=
v>Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me=
 at this address and we will talk.  </div></div><div><br>On Mar 6, 201=
2, at 1:58 PM, "C" <<a href=3D"mailto:airly2002@...">airly2002@h=
otmail.com</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"=
